quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Godzilla
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, screen, household. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: The following conversation is from the 1983 movie Bad Boys.

options.text: ptain Howard: Until then, until then, you are Mike Lowrey, you be him, thats what you are, youre him.
ptain Howard: Youre him, I dont wanna hear it, youre him. And you, youre you, you be you, but not in front of her. Youre him, youre you.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: This exchange is from the 1983 movie The Return of the Living Dead.

options.text: n: Oh, hell! Any good five men could do that!
n: Well, if theres that much, theyll probably get us wherever we are.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Name the 1985 movie about a bar-owner in Texas whos certain that his wife is cheating on him.  He hires a private detective to spy on her and discovers that she is.  He then asks the investigator to kill her and her lover.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Blood Simple

questions.question: This is from which Will Smith movie?

options.text: ristopher Gardner: Hey. Dont ever let somebody tell you... You cant do something. Not even me. All right?
ristopher Gardner: You got a dream... You gotta protect it. People cant do somethin themselves, they wanna tell you you cant do it. If you want somethin, go get it. Period.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Pursuit of Happyness

questions.question: The Brave Little Toaster was about some household appliances that go on a quest to find their owner.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: These lines can be heard in what 1964 movie starring Sean Connery?

options.text: The Man with the Golden Gun

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Goldfinger

questions.question: In 2001, a Godzilla film was released, subtitled Giant Monsters All-Out Attack, which is considered one of the best of the series.  While many monsters appear in this movie, which monster is NOT featured in the film?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Anguirus

questions.question: Gojira is the result of combining two Japanese words.  What do these two words mean in English?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Whale and Ape

questions.question: In Godzilla vs. Hedorah (1971), a socially conscious entry in the series, what ecological problem was addressed by the storyline?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pollution

questions.question: Godzilla (1984) was released in the U.S. as Godzilla 1985 and revived the series after nearly a decade.  What conection did this film have with the original U.S. release of Godzilla?

options.text: Both films feature new American scores by composer John Barry.
They are the only two films in the series in which Godzilla is shown dead.
Raymond Burr returned as the American reporter.
The same American voice actors returned thirty years later to overdub the Japanese dialogue.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Raymond Burr returned as the American reporter.

questions.question: This dialogue is from the 1941 movie CItizen Kane.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In 1995, a new Godzilla movie was released with the tagline Godzilla Dies.  Who was the Big Guys enemy in this film?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Destroyah

questions.question: In Son of Godzilla (1967) the Big Guy has an offspring who looks nothing like him; in fact, his son is cute and cuddly.  What is the name of Godzillas son?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Minya

questions.question: This movie released in 2004 has the following tag:  Whats the worst thing you ever did?  It stars Kevin Bacon and Kyra Sedgwick.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Woodsman

questions.question: Which movie that hit the big screen in 1979 included the following lines?

options.text: lonel Lucas: Your mission is to proceed up the Nung River in a Navy patrol boat. Pick up Colonel Kurtzs path at Nu Mung Ba, follow it and learn what you can along the way. When you find the Colonel, infiltrate his team by whatever means available and terminate the Colonels command.
lonel Lucas: You understand Captain that this mission does not exist, nor will it ever exist.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Apocalypse Now

questions.question: These are the last lines spoken in this 1992 movie by Robert Rodriguez which was set up as a prequel to Desperado.  All I wanted was to be a ***, like my ancestors. But the city I thought would bring me luck brought only a curse.  I lost my guitar, my hand, and her.  With this injury, I may never play the guitar again.  Without her, I have no love.  But with the dog and the weapons, Im prepared for the future.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: El Mariachi

The Lord of the Rings: Return of the King

questions.question: On Empire Magazines 1001 Greatest Movie Moments list, # 242 through 188 was devoted to Star Style such as Marlon Brandos method, Jackie Chans stunts and John Travoltas dances. This star was cited for his zingers such as He had to split, uttered after chainsawing Buzzsaw or the advice Stick around, given while knifing a guerrilla to a wall. Who shoots his wife in the face while announcing Consider that a divorce.? PS: If you need a little longer to consider your answer, I have to go to the kitchen but Ill be back.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Arnold Schwarzenegger

questions.question: Under Empire Magazines category Freakouts and Meltdowns, anchorman Howard Beale, on finding he is in danger of being fired, loses all self control, flings open the windows and screams Im mad as hell and Im not going to take this anymore. What actor played Howard Beale?

questions.question: In the movie Rocky IV, as Rocky was walking to the ring, Paulie told him that if he could be someone else he would love to be Rocky. He then said something to Rocky just after the two fighters received instructions from the referee. What did Paulie say?

options.text: Uh, Rock, you remember what I said back there about wanting to be you ........ Well youd better run and hide
Uh, Rock, you remember what I said back there about wanting to be you ........ Well, you better call a priest.
Uh, Rock, you remember what I said back there about wanting to be you ........ I lied.
Uh, Rock, you remember what I said about wantin to be you .......... Forget it.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Uh, Rock, you remember what I said about wantin to be you .......... Forget it.
